TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CookieHandler extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供抽象基底類別，以在 HTTP 用戶端用來讀取、寫入和刪除工作階段 Cookie。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class for reading, writing, and deleting session cookies on an HTTP client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks (SAM) 會使用的執行個體類別來讀取、 寫入和刪除 cookie 或包含的 cookie HTTP 用戶端上。The (SAM) uses an instance of the class to read, write, and delete the cookie or cookies that contain the on the HTTP client. Cookie （或 cookie，在其中的工作階段權杖分成數個 cookie 的情況下），其中包含工作階段語彙基元就所謂的工作階段 cookie。The cookie (or cookies, in the case where the session token is split across several cookies) that contains the session token is known as the session cookie. Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 隨附的 cookie 處理常式區塊的 cookie 處理常式呼叫藉由類別。Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) ships with a cookie handler called the chunked cookie handler that is implemented by the class. 此區塊的 cookie 處理常式會根據指定的區塊大小的一或多個 cookie 分割的工作階段權杖。The chunked cookie handler splits the session token across one or more cookies according to a specified chunk size. 這是為了符合許多瀏覽器所加諸的個別 cookie 的大小限制。This is to meet size limitations on individual cookies imposed by many browsers. 您可以從衍生建立您自己的 cookie 處理常式。You can derive from to create your own cookie handler. 當您這樣做時，您必須覆寫， ，和方法來執行刪除、 讀取和寫入工作階段 cookie 的實際工作。When you do so, you must override the , , and methods to perform the actual work of deleting, reading, and writing the session cookie. 這些方法通常會讀取從 cookie集合和寫入或刪除 cookie集合。These methods typically read the cookie from the collection and write or delete cookies through the collection. 物件透過它可以存取要求和回應會做這種方法的參數。The object through which you can access the request and response is provided as a parameter to each of these methods. 除了需要的方法，您可以選擇性地覆寫其他虛擬方法屬性所公開類別來自訂您的處理常式的行為。In addition to the required methods, you can optionally override other virtual methods properties exposed by the class to customize the behavior of your handler. 數個屬性由指定預設行為，以及工作階段 cookie 屬性的類別。Several properties are exposed by the class that specify default behavior and properties for the session cookie. ， ，和屬性提供 cookie、 它是有效的網域和其儲存在用戶端所在的路徑的基底名稱。The , , and properties supply the base name for the cookie, the domain in which it is valid and the path under which it is stored on the client. 屬性會指定是否可以用戶端指令碼存取 cookie。The property specifies whether the cookie is accessible to client-side scripts. 屬性會指定是否應該只能透過安全 (HTTPS) 連線傳輸的 cookie。The property specifies whether the cookie should be transmitted only over secure (HTTPS) connections. 如果設定，屬性用來設定的瀏覽器關閉時，即使維持有效的工作階段到期時間的持續性的工作階段。If set, the property is used to set the expiration time for persistent sessions, that is for sessions that remain valid even after the browser is closed. 所有這些屬性具有通常會設定為基礎的對等屬性"core"方法，此處理常式的物件 （或物件）。All of these properties have equivalent properties that are typically set on the underlying object (or objects) by the "core" methods of the handler. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱每個屬性的文件。For more information see the documentation for each property. 可以透過的組態中指定的 cookie 處理常式，以供 SAM [ <Requiressl> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)項目。The cookie handler that is used by the SAM can be specified in configuration through the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element. 這個項目所設定的 cookie 處理常式可以修改中的事件委派事件也可以設定或直接透過屬性。The cookie handler set by this element can be modified in an event delegate for the event or it can be set or accessed directly through the property. ## Examples 下列範例會設定使用自訂的 cookie 處理常式類型的 SAM `MyNamespace.MyCustomCookieHandler`。The following example configures the SAM to use a custom cookie handler of type `MyNamespace.MyCustomCookieHandler`. ```xml ```

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，刪除與指定的要求關聯的 Cookie，其具有指定名稱、網域及路徑。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, deletes the cookie associated with the specified request that has the specified name, domain, and path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從多載呼叫如何刪除 cookie 的實際工作的方法。Called from the overloaded methods to do the actual work of deleting the cookie. 方法可確保名稱和路徑是空字串。The methods will ensure that name and path are non-empty strings.

para.span: 實作是完全取決於開發人員。

span.span: The implementation is entirely up to the developer.

para.span: 在典型的案例中，實作會取代中的指定的 cookie集合中的，有一個 cookie資料和設定早於目前的時間; 不過，這並不是需求的到期時間。

span.span: In the typical case, implementations replace the specified cookie in the collection, with a cookie that has data and an expiration time that is set earlier than the current time; however, this is not a requirement.

span.span: if the cookie should be hidden from client script; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制是否"HttpOnly 」 旗標，就會發出 Set-cookie 標頭的處理常式所撰寫的 cookie 中。Controls whether the "HttpOnly" flag is emitted in the Set-Cookie header for cookies written by the handler. 某些網頁瀏覽器接受這個旗標會保留用戶端指令碼存取 cookie 值。Some web browsers honor this flag by keeping client-side script from accessing the cookie value. 這個屬性會對應至屬性。This property corresponds to the property. 屬性可以藉由指定初始化`hideFromScript`屬性[ <Requiressl> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)組態中的項目。The property can be initialized by specifying the `hideFromScript` attribute on the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element in configuration.

span.span: If the target domain is within the cookie domain and the target path is within the cookie path, match the casing of the cookie path portion.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Nullable<TimeSpan> PersistentSessionLifetime { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype System.TimeSpan> PersistentSessionLifetime
Public Overridable Property PersistentSessionLifetime As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
public: virtual property Nullable<TimeSpan> PersistentSessionLifetime { Nullable<TimeSpan> get(); void set(Nullable<TimeSpan> value); };

summary.span: 永續性工作階段的存留期。
如果是零，則永遠使用暫時性工作階段。

span.span: If zero, transient sessions are always used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 持續性工作階段的票證會儲存在檔案為基礎的 cookie，這表示，關閉並重新開啟網頁瀏覽器後，可繼續登入工作階段。Tickets for persistent sessions are stored in file-based cookies, meaning that the sign-in session may continue after the web browser is closed and reopened. 這個屬性用來設定屬性。This property is used to set the property. 屬性可以藉由指定初始化`persistentSessionLifetime`屬性[ <Requiressl> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)組態中的項目。The property can be initialized by specifying the `persistentSessionLifetime` attribute on the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element in configuration.

span.span: A value that is less than zero is specified.

summary.span: 讀取 Cookie。

span.span: if the cookie should only be used over an SSL connection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制是否為任何撰寫的 cookie 發出"Secure"旗標 Set-cookie 標頭中。Controls whether the "Secure" flag in the Set-Cookie header is emitted for any cookies written. 如果此值為`true`，cookie 僅可供透過 HTTPS 工作階段。If this value is `true`, the session cookies will only be available over HTTPS. 這個屬性會對應至屬性。This property corresponds to the property. 屬性可以藉由指定初始化`requireSSL`屬性[ <Requiressl> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md)組態中的項目。The property can be initialized by specifying the `requireSSL` attribute on the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element in configuration.

summary.span: 寫入 Cookie。

MemberSignature.Value: public void Write (byte[] value, bool isPersistent, DateTime tokenExpirationTime);
.method public hidebysig instance void Write(unsigned int8[] value, bool isPersistent, valuetype System.DateTime tokenExpirationTime) cil managed
Public Sub Write (value As Byte(), isPersistent As Boolean, tokenExpirationTime As DateTime)
public: void Write(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value, bool isPersistent, DateTime tokenExpirationTime);

param.name: isPersistent
param.span: 如果 Cookie 是持續性的則為 ，如果 Cookie 是工作階段專用的則為 ，也就是只在用戶端的瀏覽器關閉以前有效。

span.span: if the cookie is persistent; if the cookie is session-only, that is, only valid until the browser on the client is closed.

param.name: tokenExpirationTime
param.span: 基礎語彙基元的到期時間。

span.span: The expiration time for the underlying token.

summary.span: 寫入與目前要求相關聯的 Cookie，該要求具有指定的名稱、持續性和到期時間。

span.span: Writes a cookie associated with the current request that has the specified value, persistence, and expiration time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`isPersistent`參數是`false`，cookie 到期時間設為。If the `isPersistent` parameter is `false`, the cookie expiration time is set to . 如果`isPersistent`參數是`true`，cookie 到期時間設定的值為屬性，如果不是`null`或者，如果屬性是`null`，到期時間設值`tokenExpirationTime`參數。If the `isPersistent` parameter is `true`, the cookie expiration time is set to the value of the property if it is not `null` or, if the property is `null`, the expiration time is set to the value of the `tokenExpirationTime` parameter. 所指定的 cookie 名稱、 網域和路徑， ，和屬性。The cookie name, domain and path are specified by the , , and properties. 要求由指定。The request is specified by . 指定是否應只透過 SSL 傳送 cookie所指定屬性和從用戶端指令碼是否應該隱藏 cookie屬性。Whether the cookie should be sent only over SSL is specified by the property and whether the cookie should be hidden from client-side scripts is specified by the property.

param.span: Cookie 的到期時間，或工作階段 (工作階段專用) Cookie 的 。

span.span: The expiration time for the cookie, or for a session (session-only) cookie.

summary.span: 寫入與指定的要求相關聯的 Cookie，該要求具有指定的名稱、值和到期時間。

span.span: Writes a cookie associated with the specified request that has the specified name, value, and expiration time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所指定的 cookie 網域和路徑和屬性。The cookie domain and path are specified by the and properties. 要求由指定。The request is specified by . 指定是否應只透過 SSL 傳送 cookie所指定屬性和從用戶端指令碼是否應該隱藏 cookie屬性。Whether the cookie should be sent only over SSL is specified by the property and whether the cookie should be hidden from client-side scripts is specified by the property.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，寫入與指定的要求相關聯的 Cookie，其具有指定的名稱、值、網域、路徑、到期時間、持續性和可見度。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, writes a cookie associated with the specified request that has the specified name, value, domain, path, expiration time, persistence and visibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從多載呼叫方法撰寫 cookie 的實際工作。Called from the overloaded methods to do the actual work of writing the cookie. 方法可確保`value`非空白的位元組陣列，且`name`和`path`是空字串。The methods will ensure that `value` is a non-empty byte array and that `name` and `path` are non-empty strings.

para.span: 實作是完全取決於開發人員。

span.span: The implementation is entirely up to the developer.

para.span: 在典型的案例中，實作寫入 cookie 資料集合，不過，這並非必要條件。

span.span: In the typical case, implementations write the cookie data to the collection, however, this is not a requirement.

para.span: 大部分方法的參數通常用來設定上一個或多個對等屬性物件。

span.span: Most parameters of the method are typically used to set equivalent properties on one or more objects.
